column4: Hello guys, I have dropbox, and I have dropbox on another computer, and I'm trying to sync up and for some reason, when I add files from the other computer, my ubuntu computer isn't getting the files
Hello guys, I have dropbox, and I have dropbox on another computer, and I'm trying to sync up and for some reason, when I add files from the other computer, my ubuntu computer isn't getting the files
Yeah, Kinda annoying because on windows xp, any files I updated, automatically updated to my windows xp dropbox
have you tried Ubuntu One?  Its simialr to DropBox and you should be able to transfer your files from one folder to the other.
